name: R.O.D.D.O
description:
Be safe in the darkness or risk getting destroyed by turning on your light.
Cooperate with your partner to combine powers of your futuristic robots from the 1985 and destroy the second group of futuristic robots from the 1985. Find the weakness of their robots (which is light) and survive.

Arkham ASYLUM: Take no damage when you're hiding in the dark, just like Batman. You're Batman!
Black & White: CONTRAST the dark with the amazing power of light! Turn on you headlamp and allow your dpsfriend to deal a lot of dmg (or do it yourself just like a god Peter Molyneux wanted you to be)
System Shock: Control SYNTHETIC machines (robots) from the futuristic and highly advanced country of 1985 Japan. What a DEVELOPMENTof a human (now non-existent) race.

2 gamepads and 3 friends required. Sometimes also multiple unplugging of input devices with analog dog noses.
